summary: Configures the pytest environment for the ANSYS MAPDL Python package, offering fixtures, context managers, and utility functions to launch, control, and clean up MAPDL instances, generate geometry and meshes, and customize test reporting.
business_intent: Support automated testing of the ANSYS MAPDL Python API by managing MAPDL lifecycle, handling dependencies, and providing reusable test helpers to ensure code correctness and stability.
